Jogo Ã© tÃ£o bom que a blizzard tenta matar ele desde o inÃ­cio, porÃ©m ele resiste. Baixe ai e testa, tÃ¡ de graÃ§a mesmo. NÃ£o seja trouxa de comprar algo nesse jogo. Esquece pve.

It's a good game, negative reviews are being petty and are driven through social media, at least most of them are. I've played since near the beginning of overwatch, through PC and Xbox, and I'm glad they moved it to steam so I don't have to use the battle.net client anymore.  I miss aspects of the first game like the loot boxes but either way the game is still one of my favorites to play right now. People call it a cash grab...well yeah, if Microsoft can go through successfully with the full purchase of blizzard, they better make their investors some money. You don't have to buy their in game content if you dont' want to spend money. Bet half of the negative reviewers here are purchasing seasonal battle passes. I've spent lots of time with this game and I'll continue to do so since it's fun to play.
Game is trash and a scam, PVE was cut and now we have this crappy "Invasion" mode. Let the game die, Blizzard deserves it anyway. I rather you play League Of Legends than this crap.
Never seen actual theft from a game on steam before. Makes sense it was blizzard.
Love the PvE mode trailer from 2019! Can't wait to play it!
